settings.text:
Very impressed with the fact that, for someone new to CNC machines with no experience and prior knowledge... [I] can order this machine and be up & running within a week.

David B.

The machine was well built and assembled easily. We were making real parts on day one.

Todd M.

The machine is a MACHINE - so solidly built. The instructions were great. The user interface is intuitive.

Benjamin S.
